jobDetails: Developed critical and quality-of-life features for a Blazor web app to assist the customer support team in managing and creating estimates and invoices for over 5,000 clients.
Automated the company’s monthly data import process using C# and FME for our web and mobile SaaS products, reducing the original process time from approximately 60 hours per month.

Created an automated background job processing application using a C# MVC web app to calculate production metrics for gas, water, and oil in millions of oil wells monthly. This supported the company’s pipeline integrity product.
Expanded a WPF app with reporting features to help customers simplify their emissions reporting process.
Converted logic made inside SQL Stored procedures to C# using Entity Framework to fix maintenance and development issues.
Presented project designs and ideas to a team of 10 coworkers to improve R&D software solutions.
Created Python scripts to web scrape and discover tens-of-thousands of daily infringing copyright video links.
Added search and UI features to a script managing app built with React to ease developer and analyst workload.
Built and tested scraping features for a Google Chrome extension to automate DMCA take down notices for live sporting events.
Hosted the discovery team’s retrospective meetings to improve team productivity and efficiency.
Converted Figma prototypes to HTML to attract potential customers to use our delivery services.
Tested web pages with multiple browsers and devices to ensure web pages were cross-platform friendly.
